subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Coaches and owners may come and go in an instant these days, but the goalkeeper Pepe Reina is one example of a player who wasn't pressing for a transfer and didn't want to leave his club.
snippet: Coaches and owners may come and go in an instant these days, but the goalkeeper Pepe Reina is one example of a player who wasn't pressing for a transfer and didn't want to leave his club.
